oai_dc:dc.dc:title: P-38 aircraft on the runway
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A P-38 aircraft on the runway. Two people are just barely visible in the bottom of the frame watching as the propellers on the plane spin slowly. On verso, "One of the pursuit planes we fly. P-38 fastest plane in the world. Frank Adkins".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps
